title: Seven more Covid-related fatalities added to death toll
body_lines: The Director-General of Health Services has confirmed another 07 coronavirus-related deaths for March 11, pushing the country’s Covid-19 death toll to 16,381.
This figure includes 05 males and 02 females, according to the Department of Government Information.
One of the deceased patients is between the ages 30-59 years and the remaining 06 are in the age group of 60 years and above.
